name: Bible Dads Quiz | Bible Families | 10 Questions

questions.text: What father made a foolish vow to God, which cost him his daughter?
Eber had a son named Peleg (his name means 'division'). Why was he given that name?
questions.correct: In his time the earth was divided
options: The Red Sea was parted on the day of his birth
His birth caused his family to split
An earthquake happened on his birthday
questions.explanation:
In his time the earth was divided.

	Genesis 10:25

questions.text: What was the name of Adam's youngest named son?
questions.explanation:
Seth.

	Genesis 4:26 Although Adam is said to have had many more sons and daughters in Genesis 5, none of them are named.

questions.text: According to Proverbs, 'A ___________ spurns his father's discipline (NIV)'. What goes in the blank?
What father was 'unable to speak' until his son was born, because he doubted God's message that he was to have a son?
questions.explanation:
Zachariah.

	He was the father of John the Baptist. Luke 1:19-20

questions.text: What father saw his son from a long way off, ran to him and kissed him?
questions.correct: The Father of the Prodigal Son
questions.explanation:
The Father of the Prodigal Son.

	Luke 15:20

questions.text: Who does Jesus call the 'father of lies'?
Why does Paul say fathers should not 'embitter' (NIV) their children? (Hint: Found in Colossians)
options: They will run away from home

questions.text: Who is the 'father to the fatherless' (according to the NIV)?
